meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of ascocarps.
meanings.sent1: The ascocarpic fungi had unique structures that set them apart from other species.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied the ascocarpic mushrooms to understand their growth patterns.
meanings.sent3: The ascocarpic mushrooms threw a party for all the other fungi in the forest.
meanings.sent4: Her ascocarpic imagination bloomed like a garden of colorful ideas.
meanings.sent5: The ascocarpic features of the plant made it easy to identify in the wild.

meanings.sent1: The ascocarpic tree in the garden attracted many curious visitors.
meanings.sent2: The forest was filled with ascocarpic trees bearing fruits of various colors.
meanings.sent3: The ascocarpic tree was the envy of all the other plants in the garden.
meanings.sent4: Her ascocarpic collection of plants was a sight to behold.
meanings.sent5: The ascocarpic tree stood tall, proud of its unique fruits.

meanings.sent1: The ascocarpic plant surprised the botanist with its rapid growth.
meanings.sent2: The farmer cultivated ascocarpic crops for a bountiful harvest.
meanings.sent3: The ascocarpic plant was the star of the garden, always stealing the spotlight.
meanings.sent4: Her ascocarpic garden flourished under her careful tending.
meanings.sent5: The ascocarpic plant seemed to dance with joy as it produced its fruits.
